page.title: 09TANNERS HATCH - YOUTH HOSTEL
page.content: To members of YHA, Tanners Hatch provides walks and waymarked cycle routes, sporting activities and visits. On the walks there are a lot of sights. The cycle routes are about 15 miles long and travel through beautiful scenery. There are 3 possible sport activities to participate in; Orienteering on Ranmore Common, Horse riding in stables near Bookham, Fishing on various rivers in the area. Visits to places of historic interest include Polesden Lacy, which is only across the valley from Tanners Hatch. Open air plays are performed during the summer months.
